name: Narita Brian (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Narita Brian (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.7~

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • narita brian \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • midriff, fingerless gloves, coat on shoulders, plaid skirt, belt, asymmetrical footwear, cleavage, single thighhigh, chest sarashi

    • Casual clothes :

      • long sleeves, white shirt, purple pants

    • Blaze costume NOT included.

  • Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 68 images of narita brian

    • 4x low quality 29 images

    • 8x medium quality 17 images

    • 16x high quality 30 images

    • => 1 epoch = 812 images

  • replaced character feature tags with narita brian \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, yellow eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 9 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
